intro: Cryptocarya bellendenkerana, commonly known as the Bellendenkeran cryptocarya, is a species of flowering plant in the Lauraceae family. It is native to the rainforests of north-eastern Australia, particularly in Queensland. The plant is a small to medium-sized evergreen tree or shrub, typically reaching heights of up to 10 meters. Its leaves are elliptical, glossy, and have a distinctive aromatic scent. The flowers are small, clustered, and usually white or pale yellow, appearing in late winter to early spring.
